H0.text: Which other colour, along with yellow and green appears on the flag of Gabon. Red

H1.text: Which other colour, along with yellow and green appears on the flag of Gabon. Purple

H2.text: Which other colour, along with yellow and green appears on the flag of Gabon. Orange

H3.text: Which other colour, along with yellow and green appears on the flag of Gabon. BLUE

A4.text: The flag of Gabon is a tricolour consisting of three horizontal green, yellow, and blue bands.
